{{also|osten|östen|Östen}} ==German== {{slim-wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== From {{m|de|Ost}} or {{etyl|goh|de}} {{m|goh|ostan}}, from {{etyl|gem-pro|de}} {{m|gem-pro|*austrą}}, related to {{m|ine-pro|*ausos||dawn}}, compare {{cog|la|aurora}}, and {{cog|la|auster}}, which, probably due to a re-orientation, means "South". ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈɔstən/|/ˈɔstn̩/}} * {{audio|de|De-Osten.ogg|Audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Osten.ogg|Audio (Austria)}} * {{rhymes|de|ɔstən|ɔstn̩}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Ostens|-}} # [[East]] # {{lb|de|only with definite article}} The territory of the former [[GDR]]. # {{lb|de|by extension}} {{non-gloss definition|anything that is Eastern, e.g. Eastern Europe, Asia}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|s|n=sg}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|Westen}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Großer Osten}} * {{l|de|Mittlerer Osten}} * {{l|de|Naher Osten}} * {{l|de|Ostasien}} * {{l|de|Ostdeutschland}} * {{l|de|Osteuropa}} * {{l|de|Österreich}} * {{l|de|Osthälfte}} * {{l|de|Ostsee}} * {{l|de|Ostwind}} * {{l|de|östlich}} * {{l|de|Süden}} * {{l|de|Norden}} ===See also=== {{compass|n=Nord|ne=Nordost|e=Ost|se=Südost|s=Süd|sw=Südwest|w=West|nw=Nordwest|lang=de}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Compass points]] ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|de|lb}} {{m|de|Osten}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/ˈostən/}} ===Noun=== {{lb-noun|m|-}} # [[east]] ===See also=== * {{l|lb|Norden}} * {{l|lb|Süden}} * {{l|lb|Westen}} [[Category:lb:Compass points]]
